column2: In addition, we may collect other types of data ("Other Information") that do not reveal your identity or that do not relate directly to you or any other individual, such as Web browser and device information, including operating system, demographic information and other information provided by you that we may combine with other users of our Online Services or use on its own, mobile application usage data, aggregated information such as "click stream" information such as entry and exit points for our Online Services (including referring URLs or domains), certain Online Services traffic statistics, page views, and impressions, and information collected through cookies, pixel tags and other technologies described in more detail later in this Privacy Policy. In addition, when users request pages on our Online Services, our servers automatically log the IP address of the particular user. The IP address is a unique number assigned to your computer in order to identify it whenever you are surfing the web.
